ai-snp2.8:1.1_0: Because a person living by Dhamma can understand
ai-snp2.8:1.3_0: Practicing, there is a confident heart,
ai-snp2.8:2.1_0: A wise one, having fallen on that very day,
ai-snp2.8:2.2_0: practice in line with the teaching,
ai-snp2.8:2.3_0: She has good qualities, and is perfect in meditation.
ai-snp2.8:2.4_0: is heedful of such a kind
ai-snp2.8:3.3_0: settled right here in this very life,
ai-snp2.8:3.4_0: Without doubt regarding the conceit ‘I am’.
ai-snp2.8:4.4_0: What can he be able to get there?
ai-snp2.8:5.2_0: Let us not know the goal of ourselves.
ai-snp2.8:5.4_0: What can try for others to get it?
ai-snp2.8:6.1_0: Just as a strong rope rope,
ai-snp2.8:6.2_0: were he to be sat down,
ai-snp2.8:6.4_0: The Sage, who is skilled in that place,
ai-snp2.8:7.1_0: That’s how a knowledge master has developed themselves
ai-snp2.8:7.2_0: They’re very learned and remember the teaching.
ai-snp2.8:7.4_0: When it is reborn in a heavenly realm,
ai-snp2.8:8.1_0: So you should associate with good people,
ai-snp2.8:8.4_0: he gains happiness in the present:
ai-snp2.8:8.5_0: was the eighth Discourse on the near Mountain.
